languages.text: Переполох на нижних палубах: Главный криволов, отвечающий за изничтожение ереси в трюмах пустотного корабля, помутился рассудком от варп-морока. Офицер забрался на парапет над центральным разгонным комплексом и грозился спрыгнуть вниз, если только вся команда немедленно не согласится на досмотр с пристрастием на предмет мутаций и прочих нечестивых искажений. После подсчета временных и финансовых затрат на досмотр тысяч и тысяч членов экипажа, а также консультации с техножрецами на тему опасности попадания посторонних материалов в заборы разгонного комплекса, спятившему криволову благосклонно дали дозволение на сведение счетов с жизнью таким образом.

There was a commotion on lower decks: the chief mutant hunter, who is responsible for eliminating heresy in the hold of the voidship, went mad due to the perilous influence of the warp. The officer climbed the parapet above the central accelerator complex and threatened to jump unless the entire crew immediately submitted to a rigorous examination to uncover physical deformities and unholy perversions. After calculating the time and financial cost of the inspection of thousands upon thousands of crew members and consulting the Tech-Priests about the danger of foreign materials getting into the intake of the accelerator complex, the deranged mutant hunter was graciously allowed to proceed with ending his life in the desired manner.

traits.locale_text: There was a commotion on lower decks: the chief mutant hunter responsible for eliminating heresy in the hold of the voidship went mad due to the perilous influence of the warp. The officer climbed the parapet above the central accelerator complex and threatened to jump down unless the entire crew immediately submits to a rigorous examination to uncover physical deformities and unholy protrusions. After calculating the time and financial cost of the inspection of thousands upon thousands of crew members and consulting the tech-priests about the danger of foreign materials getting into the intake of the accelerator complex, the deranged mutant hunter was graciously allowed to proceed ending his life in the desired manner.

There was a commotion on lower decks: the chief mutant hunter, who is responsible for eliminating heresy in the hold of the voidship, went mad due to the perilous influence of the warp. The officer climbed the parapet above the central accelerator complex and threatened to jump unless the entire crew immediately submitted to a rigorous examination to uncover physical deformities and unholy perversions. After calculating the time and financial cost of the inspection of thousands upon thousands of crew members and consulting the Tech-Priests about the danger of foreign materials getting into the intake of the accelerator complex, the deranged mutant hunter was graciously allowed to proceed with ending his life in the desired manner.

languages.text: 下层甲板上发生了骚动，原本负责清除船内异端的首席变种人猎人，由于亚空间的有害影响而发了疯。这名军官爬上中央加速器大楼上方的护墙，威胁全体船员立即接受严格的检查，清查所有的畸变与反常行为，否则他立刻从上面跳下去。船上的军官计算了彻查数千名船员所需的时间和经济成本，咨询了技术神甫关于外来物质掉入加速器入口会产生的风险之后，慷慨地允许这位发了疯的变种人猎人以他自己想要的方式结束性命。
languages.original_text: There was a commotion on lower decks: the chief mutant hunter, who is responsible for eliminating heresy in the hold of the voidship, went mad due to the perilous influence of the warp. The officer climbed the parapet above the central accelerator complex and threatened to jump unless the entire crew immediately submitted to a rigorous examination to uncover physical deformities and unholy perversions. After calculating the time and financial cost of the inspection of thousands upon thousands of crew members and consulting the Tech-Priests about the danger of foreign materials getting into the intake of the accelerator complex, the deranged mutant hunter was graciously allowed to proceed with ending his life in the desired manner.

languages.text: Hubo una agitación en las cubiertas inferiores: el jefe de los cazadores de mutantes, encargado de eliminar las herejías en la bodega de la nave del vacío, enloqueció debido a la peligrosa influencia de la disformidad. El oficial trepó al parapeto situado sobre el complejo del acelerador central y amenazó con saltar a menos que toda la tripulación se sometiera inmediatamente a un riguroso examen para descubrir deformidades físicas y perversiones impías. Tras calcular el tiempo y el coste económico de la inspección de miles y miles de miembros de la tripulación y consultar a los tecnosacerdotes sobre el peligro de que materiales extraños se introdujeran en la entrada del acelerador, se permitió amablemente al trastornado cazador de mutantes que procediera a acabar con su vida de la forma deseada.
languages.original_text: There was a commotion on lower decks: the chief mutant hunter, who is responsible for eliminating heresy in the hold of the voidship, went mad due to the perilous influence of the warp. The officer climbed the parapet above the central accelerator complex and threatened to jump unless the entire crew immediately submitted to a rigorous examination to uncover physical deformities and unholy perversions. After calculating the time and financial cost of the inspection of thousands upon thousands of crew members and consulting the Tech-Priests about the danger of foreign materials getting into the intake of the accelerator complex, the deranged mutant hunter was graciously allowed to proceed with ending his life in the desired manner.

El oficial trepó al parapeto situado sobre el complejo del acelerador central y amenazó con saltar a menos que toda la tripulación se sometiera inmediatamente a un riguroso examen para descubrir deformidades físicas y perversiones impías. languages.text: 下位デッキで騒動が起きた。ヴォイドシップの拠点で異端討伐を担当する変異体ハンター長が、ワープの危険な爪痕のせいで正気を失ってしまう。士官は中央加速合施設の上にある手すり壁に登り、全てのクルーが今すぐ体の奇形と不浄の<歪み>を見つけ出す厳しい検査を大人しく受けなければ飛び降りると騒ぎ立てた。何十万ものクルーを検査する時間と財務コストを計算して、異物が加速複合施設の取入れ口に入る危険性を技術司祭と相談した結果、頭のおかしい変異体ハンターの人生を、望ましい形で終わらせることが丁重に許可された。
languages.original_text: There was a commotion on lower decks: the chief mutant hunter, who is responsible for eliminating heresy in the hold of the voidship, went mad due to the perilous influence of the warp. The officer climbed the parapet above the central accelerator complex and threatened to jump unless the entire crew immediately submitted to a rigorous examination to uncover physical deformities and unholy perversions. After calculating the time and financial cost of the inspection of thousands upon thousands of crew members and consulting the Tech-Priests about the danger of foreign materials getting into the intake of the accelerator complex, the deranged mutant hunter was graciously allowed to proceed with ending his life in the desired manner.

languages.text: Les ponts inférieurs sont en proie à une vive agitation : le chasseur de mutants en chef, responsable de l'éradication de toute forme d'hérésie dans la soute du vaisseau, a perdu la raison au contact de l'influence néfaste du Warp. L'officier a escaladé le parapet qui surplombe le complexe de l'accélérateur principal et menace de sauter à moins que l'équipage tout entier ne se soumette immédiatement à un examen minutieux afin de déterminer s'ils sont victimes de difformités et de perversions impies. Après un rapide calcul du temps et du budget nécessaires à l'inspection de dizaines de milliers de membres d'équipage, et la confirmation par les technoprêtres que l'introduction de matériaux extérieurs ne mettrait pas en péril le collecteur de l'accélérateur, le mutant pris de folie est gracieusement autorisé à mettre fin à son existence comme il le souhaite.
languages.original_text: There was a commotion on lower decks: the chief mutant hunter, who is responsible for eliminating heresy in the hold of the voidship, went mad due to the perilous influence of the warp. The officer climbed the parapet above the central accelerator complex and threatened to jump unless the entire crew immediately submitted to a rigorous examination to uncover physical deformities and unholy perversions. After calculating the time and financial cost of the inspection of thousands upon thousands of crew members and consulting the Tech-Priests about the danger of foreign materials getting into the intake of the accelerator complex, the deranged mutant hunter was graciously allowed to proceed with ending his life in the desired manner.

L'officier a escaladé le parapet qui surplombe le complexe de 'accélérateur principal et menace de sauter à moins que l'équipage tout entier ne se soumette immédiatement à un examen minutieux afin de déterminer s'ils sont victimes de difformités et de perversions impies. Après un rapide calcul du temps et du budget nécessaires à l'inspection de dizaines de milliers de membres d'équipage, et la confirmation par les technoprêtres que l'introduction de matériaux extérieurs ne mettrait pas en péril le collecteur de l'accélérateur, le mutant pris de folie est gracieusement autorisé à mettre fin à son existence comme il le souhaite.

languages.text: Auf den Unterdecks gab es Aufruhr: Der oberste Mutantenjäger, der dafür verantwortlich ist, die Ketzerei im Lagerraum des Raumschiffs zu eliminieren, ist durch den gefährlichen Einfluss des Warps wahnsinnig geworden. Der Offizier kletterte auf die Brüstung über dem zentralen Beschleunigungskomplex und drohte, hinunterzuspringen, wenn sich nicht die gesamte Crew augenblicklich einer gründlichen Untersuchung unterzieht, um physische Deformitäten und unheilige Perversionen zu entdecken. Es wurde berechnet, wie lange es dauern und wie viel es kosten würde, tausende von Crewmitgliedern einer solchen Untersuchung zu unterziehen. Parallel wurde mit den Techpriestern beraten, welche Gefahr besteht, wenn Fremdstoffe in den Einlass des Beschleunigungskomplexes geraten. Nach eingehender Prüfung wurde dem wahnsinnigen Mutantenjäger dann freundlicherweise gestattet, seinem Leben in der gewünschten Art und Weise ein Ende zu setzen.

languages.text: Alt güvertelerde bir kargaşa yaşandı: Uçsuz gemisinin ambarındaki kâfirliği yok etmekle görevli baş mutant avcısı, öteboyutun tehlikeli etkisi sonucu delirdi. Merkezî hızlandırıcı kompleksinin üzerindeki korkuluğa tırmanan subay, tüm mürettebatın fiziksel deformasyon ve uğursuz bozuklukları ortaya çıkarmak için derin bir incelemeye tabi tutulmadığı takdirde aşağı atlamakla tehdit etti. Binlerce tayfanın incelenmesinin zaman ve maliyet hesaplamaları yapıldı ve yabancı maddelerin hızlandırıcı kompleksine giriş riski hakkında Tekno Rahiplerle görüşüldü. En sonunda ise aklını yitirmiş mutant avcısının istediği şekilde hayatına son vermesine izin verildi.
languages.original_text: There was a commotion on lower decks: the chief mutant hunter, who is responsible for eliminating heresy in the hold of the voidship, went mad due to the perilous influence of the warp. The officer climbed the parapet above the central accelerator complex and threatened to jump unless the entire crew immediately submitted to a rigorous examination to uncover physical deformities and unholy perversions.
